title: Event: Ghostpoet @ Last.fm
body:
Crammed with his loveably ramshackle homemade productions and instantly recognisable vocal ditties, _Peanut Butter Blues & Melancholy Jam_ – **Ghostpoet**‘s February debut album – was not only a neat summation of the MC’s musical journey to date, but also an impressive statement of intent.

Winning him his nomination for the **Barclaycard Mercury Music Prize**, it has barely left our collective stereos since we first listened to it.

With his growing presence affording him evermore large performances, it’s with pleasure we can announce that he will be performing an intimate **Last.fm pop-up session** on Monday August 22nd and will take place at 8.00pm at _The Big Chill Bar,_ on Brick Lane, London.

This marks the final event arranged between Black Cab Sessions and Last.fm, having already seen secret pop-up acoustic sessions from Sheffield duo [**Slow Club** in Soho Square](http://youtu.be/FZ5ONXXxwoY), and London based quartet [**The Boxer Rebellion** on Carnaby Street](http://youtu.be/qTZkcUSOx-Y) .

This will be a ticketless event, but get down promptly to guarantee you have a place.
